column5: Caught the 8:30 A.M. episode. Next one at 10:30.  Great info for Musky fisherman, including vegetation, and Lunar periods, with a couple of 50" + fish.

I just watched it as well, excellent show.  Marc and Aaron, I like the way you guys handle a fish, too many shows leave the fish out of the water for too long a period (in my ever so humble opinion) to get the right shot.  I look forward to seeing more episodes...I'd watch your show any time Aaron.  Maureen
Some of us like to sleep 'till noon on Sundays, curled up with a good woman!! What would a guy do without PVR...LOL
